availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William W. R. Bruce (Breckinridge County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of William Bruce and Elizabeth A. Bruce.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 2, p. 74. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 2, p. 141. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Dehavens, p. 7. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Breckinridge County, KY, p. 486, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
